void rotate_connection_log ( int  signal_nb  ) 

rotate the file honeybrid.log every hour

rotate_connection_log

logfile_name = g_new0(char, 256); logfile_name = g_hash_table_lookup(config,"log_file"); new_name = malloc(sizeof(logfile_name) + 64); sprintf(new_name,"%s.%d%02d%02d_%02d%02d", logfile_name, (1900+tm->tm_year), (1+tm->tm_mon), tm->tm_mday, tm->tm_hour, tm->tm_min);

g_free(logfile_name); free(new_name);

The last step is to update last_rotation

References config, L, last_rotation, LOG_ALL, LOG_HIGH, LOG_LOG, and LOG_MED.

Referenced by connection_log(), and init_signal().
